name: aifabrix-docs
description: AI Fabrix documentation with Jekyll and GitHub Pages

scripts.jekyll-serve: cd site && bundle exec jekyll serve --livereload
scripts.jekyll-build: cd site && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.setup-docs: npm run sync-docs && npm run fix-yaml && npm run generate-nav
scripts.setup-docs:custom: npm run sync-docs && npm run fix-yaml && npm run generate-nav:custom

author: eSystems Nordic Oy
